level.heading: Proceedings governed by other law.
level.text: This chapter does not govern a proceeding pertaining to the authorization of emergency medical care for a child.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-293, see notes following ยง 16-4601.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 103 of the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (1997 Act). See 9, Part IA, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
